message: It's finally Friday! Despite being sick for 2.5 days, I'm still glad the weekend is upon us. So, today's question is: what are you doing tonight to celebrate the end of the week? I'm going to celebrate with a glass of wine and cooking something comforting at home with my sweetie. What about you?
Meeting my guy for dinner, and then we'll both probably crash pretty hard - long weeks for both of us!
NOTHING! I'm on 2 days off from work and loving the nothingness. I've been so busy. This is fantastic!
I might watch True Stories (David Byrne movie) and drink a couple beers, though
I'll be working on stuff tonight, but looking forward to table tennis club tomorrow... haven't been able to make it last 2 weeks...
Drinking and shooting zombies, a.k.a redneck fantasy
I know I will not be doing anything that involves math.
